name: Crows Electromusic

products.name: Lore
products.description: Lore is an analog electronic instrument for exploring tones, drones, noise, and dissonance. It features two independently controlled triangle-core oscillators with switchable frequency modulation, providing a wide range of tones.

products.name: OVUM
products.description: OVUM is a standalone all-analog tool for exploratory sound synthesis. Five independently controlled triangle-core oscillators give you five lush voices to layer and evolve. Each voice has a separate control for volume, pitch, and tone, and can be switched between a bright square wave and a crisp triangle wave.

description: Crows Electromusic is a Vancouver, Canada based electronic musical instrument company seeking to create meaningful electronic musical instruments that unlock creativity, while exploring ways to subvert the capitalist death-spiral of climate destruction and labour exploitation. The first Crows' product, OVUM was launched in March 2023.
